'''The Return of the King: A Story of the Hobbits''' is the soundtrack of [[The Return of the King (1980 film)]], released in [[1980]] by [[Disney]]land / Vista. Originally produced on vinyl, a subsequent compact disc (CD) version was released.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.monstersinmotion.com/cart/soundtrack-cd-item-list-qr-c-12_531/return-of-the-king-soundtrack-cd-1980-animated-film-p-11266.html|articlename=Return Of The King Soundtrack CD 1980 Animated Film|website=Monsters in Motion|accessed=7/9/2023}}</ref>
